file_content.text: Please, no one panic! I know it isn't easy, but you must remain calm!
What's the status here?
You don't want to go out past the quarantine, that's the status.
I mean, you can, and THORN could definitely use a hand against the rakghoul outbreak, but it's not even a little bit pretty out there.
I wouldn't be here if I couldn't handle the danger.
I'm here to help.
What's your role in all this?
Who are you?
You need to take a step back and let me do what I came here to do.
Out of my way.
Good. Glad to hear it.
Doctor Aleea Ressel, THORN emergency aid management. I'm in charge of keeping this zone secure, which is getting dicier by the minute.
Hey, I'm not stopping you. Just making sure you're prepared.
The number of infected is way out of control at this point. We have to stop the spread, and that means putting down rakghouls.
Biggest concentration of rakghouls is underground. Bad as things are up here, it's a nightmare down in the tunnels.
And how do I get there?
Things are looking up. Lucky we had you around, huh?
Have you seen it yet? The underground rakghoul nightmare?
Haven't you seen the news reports? Quarantine protocols are in effect!
Heard you made it to rakghoul central. Glad to see you're still in one piece. Stay vaccinated.
Use The Spike. It's a giant drill THORN uses to get at subsurface rakghoul populations. You'll know it when you see it.
Best of luck to you. Don't get bit.
Pardon the interruption. A colleague saw that you're near The Spike. Just wanted to thank you for taking an interest. Be safe down there.
